    com.jalios.jcms.Group.canReceiveMail(boolean, boolean)
    since jcms-6.0.2 see Group.canReceiveMail(boolean), will be removed for jcms-6.1

    com.jalios.jcms.workspace.WorkspaceManager.deepDuplicate(Workspace, Member, String, String, Workspace, boolean)
    com.jalios.jcms.portlet.PortalElement.duplicate(String, Member, boolean, Workspace, Map, Map)
    Used instead PortalElement.duplicate(WizardContext, boolean)
    com.jalios.jcms.portlet.PortalElement.duplicateDeep(PortalElement, String, Member, Workspace, Map, Map)
    Used instead PortalElement.duplicateDeep(WizardContext, PortalElement)

    use com.jalios.jcms.HttpUtil.encodeForJavaScript

    com.jalios.jcms.QueryResultSet.getScore(Object)
    use QueryResultSet.getScore(Publication)
    com.jalios.jcms.Channel.getSenderFullEmail(Publication, String)
    since JCMS-9, with the removal of Workspace.getEmail(), this method now ALWAYS returns either the channel default email or the default admin email, use Channel.getSenderFullEmail()
    com.jalios.jcms.Channel.getSenderFullEmail(Workspace, Publication, String)
    since JCMS-9, with the removal of Workspace.getEmail(), this method now ALWAYS returns either the channel default email or the default admin email, use Channel.getSenderFullEmail()
    com.jalios.jcms.Channel.getSenderFullEmail(Workspace, String)
    since JCMS-9, with the removal of Workspace.getEmail(), this method now ALWAYS returns either the channel default email or the default admin email, use Channel.getSenderFullEmail()
    com.jalios.jcms.TypeProcessor.getTypeLabel(Class)
    since jcms-5.7.0
    com.jalios.jcms.servlet.InitFilter.getUserLang(HttpServletRequest, Member)
    use InitFilter.getUserLocale(HttpServletRequest, Member) instead
    com.jalios.jcms.workspace.WKRole.getWorkerSet(Publication, boolean)
    Use new signature with publication class as third parameter to manage correctly creation process (pub == null)
    com.jalios.jcms.FileDocument.hasStrongLock()
    see Data.isStrongLocked()
    com.jalios.util.Util.html2Ascii(String)
    since jcms-9.0.0
    com.jalios.jcms.servlet.InitFilter.initMemberRequest(HttpServletRequest, Member, String)
    use InitFilter.initMemberRequest(HttpServletRequest, Member, Locale)
    com.jalios.jcms.context.JcmsJspContext.isEditIcon()
    Use new method isEditIcon with workspace and data as parameters
    com.jalios.jcms.TypeFieldEntry.isEnumerateML()
    this value might not reflect the proper translation status of the label list, you should now consider that enumerate label are always I18Ned
    com.jalios.jcms.Channel.isLdapEnabled()
    use LdapManager.isLdapEnabled()
    com.jalios.jcms.authentication.AuthenticationManager.login(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, String)
    use AuthenticationManager.login(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, Locale)
    com.jalios.jcms.authentication.AuthenticationManager.logout(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, String, Member)
    use AuthenticationManager.logout(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, Locale, Member)
    com.jalios.jcms.mail.listener.MemberMailListener.resolveAddress(Set)
    see MailManager.resolveAddress(Set)
    com.jalios.jcms.mail.listener.MemberMailListener.resolveAddress(String)
    see MailManager.resolveAddress(String)
    com.jalios.jcms.Member.setAddress(String)
    since jcms-9.0.0, use individual fields
    com.jalios.util.RssItem.setCategory(String) 
    com.jalios.util.RssItem.setEnclosureLength(int) 
    com.jalios.util.RssItem.setEnclosureType(String) 
    com.jalios.util.RssItem.setEnclosureURL(String) 
    com.jalios.util.RssChannel.setLastBuildDate(String) 
    com.jalios.jcms.JcmsUtil.setLog4jMDC()
    uses of log4j MDC cannot easily be guaranteed without memory leak instead, use JcmsPatternLayout in log4j.xml with the pattern %s
    com.jalios.jcms.handler.PubBrowserHandler.setOpCaddy(String)
    use PubBrowserHandler.setCaddyFilter(boolean)
    com.jalios.util.RssItem.setPubDate(String)
